name: AIMS Vertical — Chicken Hawk Code & Deploy

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ requestId: $json.requestId, userId: $json.userId, message: `[VERTICAL:chicken-hawk] Build and deploy: ${$json.phaseA.description}. Acceptance: ${$json.phaseA.acceptanceCriteria}`, classification: { pmoOffice: 'tech-office', director: 'Boomer_CTO', departmentalAgent: 'DevOps Agent', executionLane: 'deploy_it' }, verticalContext: $json.phaseA, executionSteps: $json.execution.steps, source: 'n8n-vertical-code-deploy' }) }}
